testAssertionsEnabled() - Method in class minesweeper.BoardTest
Testing strategy Downloading board from file, creating new random board Number of columns and rows - entered and from file Parameters legal or illegal Observers on different kinds of cells ( untouched, flagged, dug + empty, bomb) Number of neighbors on edge cells and not Mutators on different kinds of cells !

Testing strategy: mode debug, no debug board from file, random x = 1, x = 2,3, x >= 4 y = 1, y = 2,3, y >= 4 port no port, port < 0, port = 0, 0 < port < 65535, port = 65535, port > 65535 clients 1 client, > 1, many clients Cover-each-part

toString() - Method in class minesweeper.Board
Returns a string representation of a board X direction is horizontal, Y is vertical each row starts from new line (separated by "\n" character) within a line cells are separated by space character each cell is represented by one character "-" if untouched "F" if flagged " " if dug and neighbor cells do not contain bombs 1-8 number of neighbor bombs otherwise
